tourBios.carHigh:
Competed on the Adams Golf Tour.

2013: Played in one Web.com Tour event, finishing T66 at the Chitimacha Louisiana Open.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Was a two-time district champion at Garland High School...Won 2010 Rice Intercollegiate and 2010 Conference USA titles...Named first-team all-conference in 2010.
tourBios.personal: Attended Garland (Texas) High School...Has served as golf pro at Firewheel Golf Park...Earliest golf memory was making a hole-in-one with his father...Favorite course played is The Olympic Club...Lucky charm is a silver half dollar...Favorite app is Weather Channel...Favorite teams are the University of Texas, the Dallas Cowboys and the Texas Rangers...Favorite TV show is "Breaking Bad" and favorite movie is "Blazing Saddles."...Favorite entertainer is Rush...Favorite book is Unbroken...Favorite athlete is Dirk Nowitski...Favorite city is Austin...Dream foursome would include Tiger Woods, Major Applewhite and Dirk Nowitzki...Not many people know his college, Rice University, is smaller than his high school...Bucket list includes winning a major championship...Twitter name is @crbown9187.

dyn.dynResults: He has finished 66th on the Web.com Tour 2 times.
